title: Odunpazarı Modern Museum
short: Some fresh design inspiration from the Odunpazarı Modern Museum, courtesy of FutureCorp
body: Built for the Odunpazarı Modern Museum, this fresh inspiration comes courtesy of [FutureCorp](https://futurecorp.london/), a London-based digital studio. > Odunpazarı Modern Museum is a cross-cultural platform where modern and contemporary art from Turkey and abroad is exhibited with a universal perspective. Features include an impactful landing video loop, brilliant use of imagery, subtle zoom-on-hover effects & an unexpectedly interactive footer. [Check it out](https://omm.art/en/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020) * [Inspirational Freelance Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-13-inspirational-freelance-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
